director.name: 巴勃罗·阿圭罗 Pablo Agüero

introduction: After a long childhood friendship, five deaf teenagers begin to drift apart as they reach adolescence. When a global mass extinction event puts them in danger, their personal differences lead them to a crucial dilemma: stop the apocalypse to save a world that has always discriminated against them, or let it run its course and rebuild society from scratch?Project created by Nicolás Britos and written by Nicolás Britos and Maximiliano Monzón.
